entities.description: The count of responses categorized by specific variables within the survey.
The percentage representation of the unweighted frequency.
The count and percentage of data that is missing or not recorded.
Total number of valid responses collected from the survey.
Category representing number of offenders for a specific variable.
Type of variable (e.g., numeric) used in the survey.
The range of values that a variable can take, including any special missing values.

relationships.description: Indicates the count of survey responses for specific categories.
Represents the percentage of unweighted frequency within the survey.
Denotes the amount and percentage of data that is missing from the survey.
Represents the total number of valid responses collected in the survey.
Categorizes the number of offenders for specific survey variables.
Defines the type of variable used in the survey question.
Specifies the range of values that a survey variable can take, including any special missing values.
